item.title: 怎么在 homebrew 里面安装本地安装包
item.description: 引言 最近想要在 homebrew 上面下载 qbittorent, 发现我即使用的是中科大的源也下载不下来, 终端显示如下内容⬇️ 1 2 3 4 ==> Downloading https://downloads.sourceforge.net/qbittorrent/qbittorrent-mac/qbittorrent-4.3.9/qbittorrent-4.3.9.dmg curl: (35) error:06FFF089:digital envelope routines:CRYPTO_internal:bad key length=# # # Error: Download failed on Cask 'qbittorrent' with message: Download failed: https://downloads.sourceforge.net/qbittorrent/qbittorrent-mac/qbittorrent-4.3.9/qbittorrent-4.3.9.dmg
